alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Haven and Middlesex Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1005 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wethersfield to near Cromwell to Middlefield to near Wallingford. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Haven, Waterbury, Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Guilford, Wolcott, Colchester, Clinton, East Hampton, Durham, Chester, Hamden and Cheshire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven
